notes_display: In Historical Sketches of the Paper Currency of the American Colonies by Henry Phillips, Jr. (1865). Given to Dr. Jesse C. Green in 1890. Leaf 56AE. On back of page, opposite 4 Pence note on front of page.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: Six Pence. | According to an Act of General Assembly of Pensylvania, passed in the 12th Year of the Reign of his Majesty GEO. the Third. Dated the 3d Day of April, Anno Domini 1772. | Six-pence.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Six-pence. Printed by D. HALL, and W. SELLERS. 1772.
